column4: Is my blog friendly to Ubuntu users ? http://djbarney.wordpress.com/2008/05/28/how-to-keep-the-compiz-cube-zoomed-out-and-in-3d/
... I new to Ubuntu. I was worried about using vim, but maybe that's the only way to edit a protected file ?
and I've got noscript and adblock running.. but it doesn't seem to affect so I guess it's playing by the rules =)
